items.content_html: flxy.js is a lightweight, flexible, and easy-to-use frontend framework built with vanilla JavaScript. Designed to help developers create dynamic and responsive web applications without the overhead of external dependencies, flxy.js provides a minimal yet powerful structure for building reusable components and managing state in an intuitive way.

Designed to help developers create dynamic and responsive web applications without the overhead of external dependencies, flxy.js provides a minimal yet powerful structure for building reusable components and managing state in an intuitive way.

items.content_html: Taco Cat is a fun, interactive web app designed to check if a word, sentence, or phrase is a palindrome. This lightweight project leverages HTML, JavaScript, and Bootstrap to create a seamless user experience while reinforcing string manipulation and DOM interaction skills.
items.title: alfie-prometheus/tacocat: Taco Cat is a fun, interactive web app designed to check if a word, sentence, or phrase is a palindrome. This lightweight project leverages HTML, JavaScript, and Bootstrap to create a seamless user experience while reinforcing string manipulation and DOM interaction skills.

items.content_html: ui-borders is a lightweight tool for front-end developers that adds alternating colored borders to elements on a web page. It helps visualize boundaries, debug layouts, and align elements during UI development. With simple toggle commands, developers can enable or disable the borders without disrupting their workflow.
items.title: datoche-juarez/ui-borders: ui-borders is a lightweight tool for front-end developers that adds alternating colored borders to elements on a web page. It helps visualize boundaries, debug layouts, and align elements during UI development. With simple toggle commands, developers can enable or disable the borders without disrupting their workflow.
